title: Local Penumbra Mod Data
description: The locally stored data for an installed mod in Penumbra

FileVersion.description: Major version of the local data schema used.

ImportDate.description: The date and time of the installation of the mod as a Unix Epoch millisecond timestamp.

LocalTags.description: User-defined local tags for the mod.

Favorite.description: Whether the mod is favourited by the user.
